title: SaasCan Scanner
subtitle: Instantly scan and analyze your SaaS ideas with AI-powered insights to validate your vision
inputDescription: Share your software concept, target market, or business model for detailed scanning and AI-powered feedback
inputPlaceholder:
Your SaaS idea...
Ex: "Project management tool for remote teams. $49/mo."
noResultsDesc: Describe your SaaS idea above to get started with professional scanning and recommendations
inputRequiredDesc: Please describe your SaaS concept to scan
analysisCompleteDesc: Your SaaS idea scan has been completed and saved
analysisErrorDesc: There was an error processing your SaaS scan. Please try again.
historyClearedDesc: All scan history has been removed
exportCompleteDesc: Your SaaS scan data has been downloaded
dataRestoredDesc: Found {count} saved scans from previous sessions
footerTagline: Advanced SaaS idea scanning powered by AI to help entrepreneurs validate and improve their software concepts.
githubStarDesc: Help us grow by starring this project

onboarding.step1Desc: Provide a detailed description of your software concept, target market, and business model
onboarding.step2Desc: Our AI scans market potential, technical feasibility, and competitive landscape
onboarding.step3Desc: Review comprehensive insights to refine and improve your SaaS strategy

examples.crm: Customer Relationship Management tool for small businesses with automated follow-ups and integration with popular email platforms. Monthly subscription at $29/user.
examples.projectManagement: Project management platform for remote teams with time tracking, collaboration tools, and client portals. Tiered pricing from $15-50/month.
examples.analytics: Website analytics dashboard with real-time visitor tracking, conversion optimization, and custom reporting. Freemium model with premium features at $39/month.
